 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָתַם‎</span>] **verb** ==bind, attach== (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> thread bound to finger as reminder); — 

**Qal** ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְתֹם הַמֶּרְכָּבָה לָרֶכֶשׁ‎</span> [[Mic.1.13|Mic 1:13]].
